name: Pyroblazer®
description: Pyroblazer® is a futuristic combat racing game. Set amidst the awe-inspiring locations of New Apeiron, players get the opportunity to race through a multitude of environments using a wide selection of anti-gravity craft known as Blazers.
minimum_requirements: Supported OS: Windows® XP or Vista                    Processor: Single Core 3.0GHz CPU                    Memory: 1GB RAM                    Video: 128MB DirectX 9 GPU                    DirectX® Version: 9.0                    Hard Drive: 4GB
